text: Carlo Da Pra (born October 5, 1931 in Lozzo di Cadore) was an Italian bobsledder who competed in the late 1950s. He finished fifth in the four-man event at the 1956 Winter Olympics in Cortina d'Ampezzo. Italian championship, four-man Gold Medal, in 1955 with Dino De Martin, Giovanni De Martin and Giovanni Tabacchi. ==References== *1956 bobsleigh four-man results *Wallechinsky, David (1984). "Bobsled: Four-man". In The Complete Book of the Olympics: 1896 - 1980. New York: Penguin Books. p. 561\. title: Carlo Da Prà
